description: This file contains utility functions for splitting a string into a linked list of tokens, with functions to validate and add tokens.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a string into a linked list of non-empty tokens separated by spaces.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the list if it is valid (non-empty).

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid (not empty).
